spas.usercontrol

Class EmailNewPassword

  • java.lang.Object
    • spas.usercontrol.EmailNewPassword

  • public class EmailNewPassword
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for making and sending a new password to user's email.
    Since:
    0.2
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Lauri Lavanti

    • Constructor Detail

      • EmailNewPassword

        public EmailNewPassword(UserLoginHandler uh)
        Creates a new EmailNewPassword-object. Needs UserLoginHandler for checking userfiles.
        Parameters:
        uh - Handler for checking userfiles.
        See Also:
        For checking user's.

    • Method Detail

      • createNewPassword

        public boolean createNewPassword(java.lang.String email,
                        java.lang.String userdb)
        Main (and only) functionality in this class. Creates and sends a new password to given email, if and only if, there is a user registered with that email.
        Parameters:
        email - The user's email.
        userdb - The absolute path to the folder containing all the user files.
        Returns:
        true, if nothing went wrong and user existed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        Checks user's with this., Changes password with this.

      • sendEmail

        private boolean sendEmail(java.lang.String to,
                java.lang.String subject,
                java.lang.String content)
        Sends email to given recipient.
        Parameters:
        to - Address to send email to.
        subject - Subject for email to be sent.
        content - The message itself.
        Returns:
        true, if nothing went wrong.
